page.description: The Web Projects Control Panel has several tools to assist in the management of the files that are used to compose web pages.

case.title: Filter the file list by file type
case.description: Select "A5W Pages", "HTML Pages", "Images", or "Web Components" to show only the files of the selected type.

case.title: Display icons instead of text
case.description: Right click on the right pane and select View > Icon.

case.title: Display file size and modified date
case.description: Right click on the right pane and select View > Details.

case.title: Create a subfolder to organize files
case.description: Right click on the right pane and select New Folder, enter its name, and click OK.

case.title: Delete a subfolder
case.description: Right click on a folder, select Delete Folder, and click OK.

case.title: Navigate to parent folder (move up).
case.description: Click on the Web Projects Control Panel.

case.title: Import a file into a project

case.description: 1. Right on the right pane and select Add File.
2. Select the file type from the Files of type list.
3. Navigate to the file's directory, select it, and click Open.
